creator: gregor@apache.org
text:
care has to be taken to only look at the filename in the file input field, not
the whole path (as it may contain spaces on windows). some javascript code is
already in there, but needs to be adapted.

creator: gregor@apache.org
text: whitespace is now converted to underscores

creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: This is already resolved for 1.2.1 (see previous comment).
